name: githubprlabels
description: Add ,remove or list labels in GitHub pull requests
helpMarkDown: Add ,remove or list labels in GitHub pull requests
author: JeroenvdB

inputs.name: gitHubConnection
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your GitHub connection. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether the label should be added or removed from the pull request

inputs.name: label
inputs.label: Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the existing label to add/remove in the GitHub PR. Remember that the label definition must already exist!

inputs.name: variable
inputs.label: variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the variable to store the labels
